ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: They had a Premium customer class that effectively reduced everyone else to the status of peasants. ... From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:john@tatsukawa.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
They had a Premium customer class that effectively reduced everyone else to
the status of peasants.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:john@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 11, 2000 3:24 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of


At 02:32 PM 10/11/00 -0600, you wrote:
> >snip>
>I'd think you'd have to be
>absolutely nuts to want to pay $49.95/month. What was that all about? :-P
>
>---Windleaf
><snip<
>
>I wondered about that too? *boggle* Anyone remember DragonRealms besides
>me and Talies?

Sorry, I don't. What was their story?

>My biggest gripe about Verant's misconceptions about Bards is that they
fail
>to realize that using no mana is equivalent to using mana less than one's
>mana regeneration rate.

Well we are able to run around and use our abilities instead of just
sitting. Swing weapons, keep an eye on the tactical situation (I'm usually
the only person in my group who is looking around outside of the battle it
seems) swap to instruments, etc.

Also, our haste song (to use the example of the enchanter keeping 3 tanks
hasted) does have the added component of STR.



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
